name: SEX with HITLER: 2069
description:
Sex With Hitler:2069 is a unique blend of visual novel and top-down shooter.

Fuhrer - is the protagonist of the story, He lost everything and now he’s looking for a new life.

Along with him, you will fight in the fields of cyberpunk world and meet unique heroines, among whom you will find both friends and enemies.

Features:
  • Gunplay with soldiers
  • Lots of weapons to choose
  • Hot scenes to unlock
  • Many indecent scenes with the main character
  • A Multitude of Sexy Situations

All characters are over 18 years old
